name: Objects Lost in Time
description:
Hello everyone, this is my GameJam.js submission. 

Eventually, there is a problem with the WebGL Version and it doesn't seem to load or it takes a long time. So I just uploaded the downloadable version... hope it doesn't break the rules. 

But the most important thing is, that I had fun :D

You are a scientist who just invented the time machine, but it has one problem. The machine needs a certain liquid that can only be made with 5 very specific things. In order to repair the machine, you have to travel in time and past to find these objects. The Main Problem is that you need to find out in which time you have to travel

Hope you'll enjoy! Would be happy bout every comment.

----Controls

WASD - walk
SPACE - skip dialogue
ESCAPE - Quit from books etc.
E - Interact
